ygData.subject: Life is soooo Good!
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL. I just loaded in my new mem chip so now I have 230MB. Cool huh? The only problem is I also bought a new vid card (This one is AGP) and I can t seem to get
ygData.messageBody:
LOL. I just loaded in my new mem chip so now I have 230MB. Cool huh?
The only problem is I also bought a new vid card (This one is AGP)
and I can't seem to get it to work. *sigh* I might have to wait until
I move on campus next week and a friend can take a crack at it.
Anyway. Since all of this is happening I am hopefully going to be
able to log in as soon as I get a phone line, maybe by this next
weekend? I would like to thank everyone here for the help ya'll have
given me so I could get back into the game. And I'd like to thank in
advance for any other questions that I WILL have. LOL The Raven
